name: Forest Adventures No. 374
description:
@FranklinsGhost

Made for Secret Santa Jam 2020

Explore a fantasy forest and defeat the box enemies.

Had to make a game for someone who wanted a game like Cuphead. So decided to try and make a similar game with my brother doing all the art.

It's still unfinished and a bit of a mess but we'll keep working on it till it's playable.

Buttons:

ARROWS - to move

Z - to stay in place while shooting in different directions

X - to shoot

C - to jump
